resources.string: Do you really want to disconnect your device?

Shamrock lets you control other phones by sending text commands. Pretty cool huh? It's really easy to set up!

1. Use NFC (Beam) to pair the phones. The phone whose screen you tap will be the receiver.

2. Type a command on the sender device and watch it appear on the receiver's screen. Shamrock can currently handle phone numbers, URLs, and map queries.
